column61: Please list at most three characteristics of an ideal post summary
column62: Any general thought before we end the survey?
column63: On the scale from 1-7, please rate how much you agree with the following statement: It is helpful to see a summary when reading a SO post.

column61: refer to resources, concise, contain a solution
column62: Maybe the post should include source code and also retrieve information from hyper-links.
column63: refer to resources, concise, contain a solution

column62: For many relatively short SO posts, like less than 30 lines maybe, having a glance at the original post doesnâ€™t seem to require much time, and a not perfect summary might be unhelpful
I want the summary to be concise and not missing important information, which could help me decide whether to read the post
I like to have post summaries so I can quickly get the gist of the idea
Not SO useful when it comes to short answers (especially the ones with code)
There are some minor typos in the user study sheet
Hope the summaries can help me to omit more useless information
